Case# CFLocaleLanguageDirection.rightToLeft

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
case rightToLeft
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection/rightToLeft#Discussion)

The language direction is from right to left.
